module: Module-level comment: The alt_vipcti130_Vid2IS_av_st_output module processes video data from a FIFO to output interface with managed interlacing support. Utilizing input controls and a state machine, it directs video frame formatting, checks packet validity, and oversees output synchronization. The module handles variations in data and field characteristics, employing internal signals for state tracking and control header management to ensure data conforms to video standards efficiently.
